Codes

  • fmCalculator (git) : This is a small app that caltulates the ourcome of spectrum frequencies from FM synthesizing.
  • SuperSampler (git) : A sampler synthesizer project on SuperCollider. The sampler is using audio content analysis techniques to make decisions on sampler systhesizing processing.
